subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Marcus Burghardt outdueled Carlos Barredo in the final 300 yards to win the Team Columbia's fifth stage of the Tour de France as the race moved out of the Alps and toward Sunday’s finish in Paris with Carlos Sastre still in the lead.
snippet: Marcus Burghardt outdueled Carlos Barredo in the final 300 yards to win the Team Columbia's fifth stage of the Tour de France as the race moved out of the Alps and toward Sunday’s finish in Paris with Carlos Sastre still in the lead.
